item.title: Real-Time Call Center Transcription: Over 90% Cost Reduction with Better Features
item.description:
After six months with Azure OpenAI’s Whisper API, a major call center needed a better solution. They were processing hundreds of thousands of minutes of audio per day, and costs were climbing. More importantly, they needed speaker diarizationâ€”something the OpenAI API simply didn’t offer.

Without diarization, they couldn’t answer critical performance management questions: What percentage of agents proactively offered a specific solution? What percentage mentioned key product features? Which agents needed coaching on particular topics? These insights were locked behind the technical limitation of not knowing who said what.

item.title: Welcome to the Carolina Cloud Blog
item.description:
Welcome to the official Carolina Cloud blog! We’re excited to share our journey building a family-owned cloud platform that puts transparency, performance, and affordability first.

Why We Built Carolina Cloud

As researchers, we experienced firsthand the frustrations of traditional cloud providers: confusing pricing, long cluster queues, and bills that spiraled out of control. We knew there had to be a better way.

Carolina Cloud was born from a simple idea: what if cloud computing was transparent, affordable, and actually designed for the people who use it?
